ComicInfo.Summary:
Year Two of the radical Robotech reimagining - the classic sci-fi anime reborn with legendary Transformers writer Simon Furman and Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers artist Hendry Prasetya!
The conspiracy behind the SDF-1's exile deepens, and Lisa clashes with Roy while Rick's injuries and powers collide! Perfect for fans both old and new, supported by the official Robotech Facebook page with over 200,000 followers.
